pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for Central Bank APIs // A client for retrieving data and metadata from major central bank APIs. It supports access to the 'Bundesbank SDMX Web Service API' (https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series- databases/help-for-sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface- data), the 'Swiss National Bank Data Portal' (https://data.snb.ch/en), and the 'European Central Bank Data Portal API' (https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/overview).
